description.value:
Granted Powers: You are an explorer and find enlightenment in the simple joy of travel, be it by foot or conveyance or magic. Increase your base speed by 10 feet.

Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.hosf489xyoexmp57]{Longstrider}
  • 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.tcnirpnzjdaym1fd]{Locate Object}
  • 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.7d6sv5ecvi7kho3m]{Fly}
  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.ojwg1ki98tq8xyh9]{Dimension Door}
  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.ptqu8gtrujxsvwy1]{Teleport}
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.x619lrcykmmwts0f]{Find the Path}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.5cdmojmydhwowzy1]{Teleport, Greater}
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.nq4txj4d0dtzscu2]{Phase Door}
  • 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{Astral Projection}
